00069 
00070 static ListBase dropboxes = {NULL, NULL};
00071 
00072 /* drop box maps are stored global for now */
00073 /* these are part of blender's UI/space specs, and not like keymaps */
00074 /* when editors become configurable, they can add own dropbox definitions */
00075 
00076 typedef struct wmDropBoxMap {
00077     struct wmDropBoxMap *next, *prev;
00078     
00079     ListBase dropboxes;
00080     short spaceid, regionid;
00081     char idname[KMAP_MAX_NAME];
00082     
00083 } wmDropBoxMap;
00084 
00085 /* spaceid/regionid is zero for window drop maps */
00086 ListBase *WM_dropboxmap_find(const char *idname, int spaceid, int regionid)
00087 {
00088     wmDropBoxMap *dm;
00089     
00090     for (dm = dropboxes.first; dm; dm = dm->next)
00091         if (dm->spaceid == spaceid && dm->regionid == regionid)
00092             if (0 == strncmp(idname, dm->idname, KMAP_MAX_NAME))
00093                 return &dm->dropboxes;
00094     
00095     dm = MEM_callocN(sizeof(struct wmDropBoxMap), "dropmap list");
00096     BLI_strncpy(dm->idname, idname, KMAP_MAX_NAME);
00097     dm->spaceid = spaceid;
00098     dm->regionid = regionid;
00099     BLI_addtail(&dropboxes, dm);
00100     
00101     return &dm->dropboxes;
00102 }
00103 
00104 
00105 
00106 wmDropBox *WM_dropbox_add(ListBase *lb, const char *idname, int (*poll)(bContext *, wmDrag *, wmEvent *),
00107                           void (*copy)(wmDrag *, wmDropBox *))
00108 {
00109     wmDropBox *drop = MEM_callocN(sizeof(wmDropBox), "wmDropBox");
00110     
00111     drop->poll = poll;
00112     drop->copy = copy;
00113     drop->ot = WM_operatortype_find(idname, 0);
00114     drop->opcontext = WM_OP_INVOKE_DEFAULT;
00115     
00116     if (drop->ot == NULL) {
00117         MEM_freeN(drop);
00118         printf("Error: dropbox with unknown operator: %s\n", idname);
00119         return NULL;
00120     }
00121     WM_operator_properties_alloc(&(drop->ptr), &(drop->properties), idname);
00122     
00123     BLI_addtail(lb, drop);
00124     
00125     return drop;
00126 }
00127 
00128 void wm_dropbox_free(void)
00129 {
00130     wmDropBoxMap *dm;
00131     
00132     for (dm = dropboxes.first; dm; dm = dm->next) {
00133         wmDropBox *drop;
00134         
00135         for (drop = dm->dropboxes.first; drop; drop = drop->next) {
00136             if (drop->ptr) {
00137                 WM_operator_properties_free(drop->ptr);
00138                 MEM_freeN(drop->ptr);
00139             }
00140         }
00141         BLI_freelistN(&dm->dropboxes);
00142     }
00143     
00144     BLI_freelistN(&dropboxes);      
00145 }

00148 
00149 /* note that the pointer should be valid allocated and not on stack */
00150 wmDrag *WM_event_start_drag(struct bContext *C, int icon, int type, void *poin, double value)
00151 {
00152     wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
00153     wmDrag *drag = MEM_callocN(sizeof(struct wmDrag), "new drag");
00154     
00155     /* keep track of future multitouch drag too, add a mousepointer id or so */
00156     /* if multiple drags are added, they're drawn as list */
00157     
00158     BLI_addtail(&wm->drags, drag);
00159     drag->icon = icon;
00160     drag->type = type;
00161     if (type == WM_DRAG_PATH)
00162         BLI_strncpy(drag->path, poin, FILE_MAX);
00163     else
00164         drag->poin = poin;
00165     drag->value = value;
00166     
00167     return drag;
00168 }
00169 
00170 void WM_event_drag_image(wmDrag *drag, ImBuf *imb, float scale, int sx, int sy)
00171 {
00172     drag->imb = imb;
00173     drag->scale = scale;
00174     drag->sx = sx;
00175     drag->sy = sy;
00176 }

00178 
00179 static const char *dropbox_active(bContext *C, ListBase *handlers, wmDrag *drag, wmEvent *event)
00180 {
00181     wmEventHandler *handler = handlers->first;
00182     for (; handler; handler = handler->next) {
00183         if (handler->dropboxes) {
00184             wmDropBox *drop = handler->dropboxes->first;
00185             for (; drop; drop = drop->next) {
00186                 if (drop->poll(C, drag, event))
00187                     /* XXX Doing translation here might not be ideal, but later we have no more
00188                      *     access to ot (and hence op context)... */
00189                     return RNA_struct_ui_name(drop->ot->srna);
00190             }
00191         }
00192     }
00193     return NULL;
00194 }
00195 
00196 /* return active operator name when mouse is in box */
00197 static const char *wm_dropbox_active(bContext *C, wmDrag *drag, wmEvent *event)
00198 {
00199     wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
00200     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00201     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00202     const char *name;
00203     
00204     name = dropbox_active(C, &win->handlers, drag, event);
00205     if (name) return name;
00206     
00207     name = dropbox_active(C, &sa->handlers, drag, event);
00208     if (name) return name;
00209     
00210     name = dropbox_active(C, &ar->handlers, drag, event);
00211     if (name) return name;
00212 
00213     return NULL;
00214 }
00215 
00216 
00217 static void wm_drop_operator_options(bContext *C, wmDrag *drag, wmEvent *event)
00218 {
00219     wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
00220     
00221     /* for multiwin drags, we only do this if mouse inside */
00222     if (event->x < 0 || event->y < 0 || event->x > win->sizex || event->y > win->sizey)
00223         return;
00224     
00225     drag->opname[0] = 0;
00226     
00227     /* check buttons (XXX todo rna and value) */
00228     if (UI_but_active_drop_name(C) ) {
00229         strcpy(drag->opname, IFACE_("Paste name"));
00230     }
00231     else {
00232         const char *opname = wm_dropbox_active(C, drag, event);
00233         
00234         if (opname) {
00235             BLI_strncpy(drag->opname, opname, FILE_MAX);
00236             // WM_cursor_modal(win, CURSOR_COPY);
00237         }
00238         // else
00239         //  WM_cursor_restore(win);
00240         /* unsure about cursor type, feels to be too much */
00241     }
00242 }
00243 
00244 /* called in inner handler loop, region context */
00245 void wm_drags_check_ops(bContext *C, wmEvent *event)
00246 {
00247     wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
00248     wmDrag *drag;
00249     
00250     for (drag = wm->drags.first; drag; drag = drag->next) {
00251         wm_drop_operator_options(C, drag, event);
00252     }
00253 }
00254 
00255 /* ************** draw ***************** */
00256 
00257 static void wm_drop_operator_draw(const char *name, int x, int y)
00258 {
00259     int width = UI_GetStringWidth(name);
00260     
00261     glColor4ub(0, 0, 0, 50);
00262     
00263     uiSetRoundBox(UI_CNR_ALL | UI_RB_ALPHA);
00264     uiRoundBox(x, y, x + width + 8, y + 15, 4);
00265     
00266     glColor4ub(255, 255, 255, 255);
00267     UI_DrawString(x + 4, y + 4, name);
00268 }
00269 
00270 static const char *wm_drag_name(wmDrag *drag)
00271 {
00272     switch (drag->type) {
00273         case WM_DRAG_ID:
00274         {
00275             ID *id = (ID *)drag->poin;
00276             return id->name + 2;
00277         }
00278         case WM_DRAG_PATH:
00279             return drag->path;
00280         case WM_DRAG_NAME:
00281             return (char *)drag->path;
00282     }
00283     return "";
00284 }
00285 
00286 static void drag_rect_minmax(rcti *rect, int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
00287 {
00288     if (rect->xmin > x1)
00289         rect->xmin = x1;
00290     if (rect->xmax < x2)
00291         rect->xmax = x2;
00292     if (rect->ymin > y1)
00293         rect->ymin = y1;
00294     if (rect->ymax < y2)
00295         rect->ymax = y2;
00296 }
00297 
00298 /* called in wm_draw.c */
00299 /* if rect set, do not draw */
00300 void wm_drags_draw(bContext *C, wmWindow *win, rcti *rect)
00301 {
00302     wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
00303     wmDrag *drag;
00304     int cursorx, cursory, x, y;
00305     
00306     cursorx = win->eventstate->x;
00307     cursory = win->eventstate->y;
00308     if (rect) {
00309         rect->xmin = rect->xmax = cursorx;
00310         rect->ymin = rect->ymax = cursory;
00311     }
00312     
00313     /* XXX todo, multiline drag draws... but maybe not, more types mixed wont work well */
00314     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00315     for (drag = wm->drags.first; drag; drag = drag->next) {
00316         
00317         /* image or icon */
00318         if (drag->imb) {
00319             x = cursorx - drag->sx / 2;
00320             y = cursory - drag->sy / 2;
00321             
00322             if (rect)
00323                 drag_rect_minmax(rect, x, y, x + drag->sx, y + drag->sy);
00324             else {
00325                 glColor4f(1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.65); /* this blends texture */
00326                 glaDrawPixelsTexScaled(x, y, drag->imb->x, drag->imb->y, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, drag->imb->rect, drag->scale, drag->scale);
00327             }
00328         }
00329         else {
00330             x = cursorx - 8;
00331             y = cursory - 2;
00332             
00333             /* icons assumed to be 16 pixels */
00334             if (rect)
00335                 drag_rect_minmax(rect, x, y, x + 16, y + 16);
00336             else
00337                 UI_icon_draw_aspect(x, y, drag->icon, 1.0, 0.8);
00338         }
00339         
00340         /* item name */
00341         if (drag->imb) {
00342             x = cursorx - drag->sx / 2;
00343             y = cursory - drag->sy / 2 - 16;
00344         }
00345         else {
00346             x = cursorx + 10;
00347             y = cursory + 1;
00348         }
00349         
00350         if (rect) {
00351             int w =  UI_GetStringWidth(wm_drag_name(drag));
00352             drag_rect_minmax(rect, x, y, x + w, y + 16);
00353         }
00354         else {
00355             glColor4ub(255, 255, 255, 255);
00356             UI_DrawString(x, y, wm_drag_name(drag));
00357         }
00358         
00359         /* operator name with roundbox */
00360         if (drag->opname[0]) {
00361             if (drag->imb) {
00362                 x = cursorx - drag->sx / 2;
00363                 y = cursory + drag->sy / 2 + 4;
00364             }
00365             else {
00366                 x = cursorx - 8;
00367                 y = cursory + 16;
00368             }
00369             
00370             if (rect) {
00371                 int w =  UI_GetStringWidth(wm_drag_name(drag));
00372                 drag_rect_minmax(rect, x, y, x + w, y + 16);
00373             }
00374             else 
00375                 wm_drop_operator_draw(drag->opname, x, y);
00376             
00377         }
00378     }
00379     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00380 }
